text: Answer: (b) Solution: Insert (): Since all the vertices need to be inserted in priority queue, hence insert () will call n times. Extract_min () - It delete the vertex with shortest distance from source vertex one by one. So, we have to call this function n time. Decrease_key () - After edge relaxation decrease_key() function is called. In Dijkstra’s we know that every edge is relaxed once. So, this function will be called ‘m’ times. _Option (b) is correct.
